name: Python IntelliSense
author: Microsoft
description: IntelliSense (Pylance), Lanting, Debugging (multi-threaded, remote), Jupyter Notebooks, code formatting, refactoring, unit tests, and more.

name: Docker Explorer
author: DevTools Inc.
description: Manage Docker containers, images, volumes, and networks directly from CodeStation.

name: React Snippet Pack
author: Web Wizards
description: A comprehensive collection of React, Redux, and GraphQL snippets for faster development.

name: Jupyter Power Tools
author: Data Gurus
description: Enhance your Jupyter experience with variable explorers, cell timing, and presentation mode.

name: Terraform Linter
author: Cloud Ninjas
description: Provides real-time linting and validation for your Terraform files (HCL).

name: JSON & YAML
author: Util Masters
description: Easily convert files between JSON and YAML formats with a single click.

name: SQLite Browser
author: DB Pros
description: Connect to PostgreSQL, MySQL, and SQLite databases. Run queries and view results.

name: GitLens
author: Git Tools
description: View Git blame, history, and file changes inline. Inspired by GitLens.

name: Prettier Formatter
author: Code Formatters
description: Run Prettier code formatter on your files to ensure consistent styling.

name: REST Client
author: API Heroes
description: Send HTTP/S requests and view the response directly in CodeStation.
